```{r}
library(tidyverse)
match.stock <- read_csv("data/MTCH_0208.csv") %>% 
  select(date = Date,
         close = Close)
write.csv(match.stock, "data/MTCH_0208_reduced.csv", row.names = FALSE)

ggplot(match.stock, mapping = aes(x = date, y = close)) +
  geom_line()


```
